replies.body:
Hey there, I regret to be the bearer of bad news, but I took a look at your account and it looks like you received a 2 week suspension later in October.

Sadly, getting a ban of 7 days or more after the 22nd of August means you were not eligible for Ranked Rewards in Season 7 as we stated back in our [**FAQ post**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068) in Summer. This means you won't be getting a border for your climb this season, but you can still make a comeback with positive reform and show up your opponents in Season 8 for rewards then!
